item.description:
Worcester has always been known for its lively music scene and its ability to nurture artists of all genres. This photo competition and exhibition–WORMTOWN ROCKS!–to be held at the Worcester Art Museum, will be a dynamic and unique snapshot of the music scene of the Worcester area, highlighting both photographic as well as musical talents of the area. In partnership with ARTSWorcester, the Worcester Art Museum is soliciting artworks for the juried exhibition that will be shown in the Higgins Education Wing from April 6,― May 14, 2010.

There will be cash awards!

The juried exhibition is being held in conjunction with Who Shot Rock & Roll:
A Photographic History, 1955 to the Present, a photography exhibition on
display at the Worcester Art Museum from March 5-May 30, 2010.

If you are interested the Competition pamphlet & entry form is located here:
http://files.meetup.c...

Please not some important dates...

Intent to Submit Due Wednesday, March 10, 2010
Work Submission Dates Friday, March 26, 10am-4pm

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Wormtown Rocks! -- A Juried Exhibition & Competition
